snippet: I called the owner to discuss things. Until now I had been dealing with others in the company. He was prepared, I think, for an unpleasant conversation.
abstract: I called the owner to discuss things. Until now I had been dealing with others in the company. He was prepared, I think, for an unpleasant conversation.

headline.main: What to Do About Our Client Who Can't Pay Us
headline.print_headline: On a Client Who Can’t Pay
